dataList.name: Injected Hatred and Animosity
dataList.desc: จบเทิร์น: At 50%- Core HP, ได้รับ 1 [Enhancement] ในเทิร์นถัดไป. (once per encounter)

dataList.name: White Gossypium
dataList.desc: จบเทิร์น: un-Stagger enemies, and สร้าง (Stagger LV x 8) [Laceration] and 2 [Reduction] on them ในเทิร์นถัดไป.

dataList.name: Binding Roots
dataList.desc: จบเทิร์น: Apply 1 [Binding] to all enemies with Gossypium

dataList.name: Red-stained Gossypium
dataList.desc: At 20%- Core HP, become [MRcAfBb] at จบเทิร์น. This [MRcAfBb] does not expire.

dataList.name: To be Drenched in Blood
dataList.desc: When hitting a target with an Attack Skill, heal HP เท่ากับ [Laceration] บนตัวเป้าหมาย.

dataList.name: Gossypium Planting
dataList.desc: If this unit loses a Clash using Scattering Gossypium, use Encroaching Gossypium ในเทิร์นถัดไป.

dataList.name: Flowering Gossypium
dataList.desc: When the Body Part is broken, halve the value of Gossypium on all enemies.

dataList.name: Flaming Ember
dataList.desc: Convert a number of non-Wrath Affinity Skills เท่ากับ the value of Ember into Wrath Affinity.

dataList.name: Interlocking Ardor Blossom
dataList.desc:
On Hit, สร้าง [Combustion] เท่ากับ (# of Wrath Affinity Skills that the Ardor Blossom Moth will use this turn).
On Hit, heal HP เท่ากับ (# of Wrath Affinity Skills that the Ardor Blossom Moth will use this turn x2).

dataList.name: The Last Ember
dataList.desc: At 30%- HP, ได้รับ +1 more [MRcAiBa]

dataList.name: Stoke the Flames
dataList.desc: When using Ardor Blossom Star, if the Abnormality has 0 [MRcAiBa], use Stoke the Flames.

dataList.name: Contempt and Gaze
dataList.desc:
สร้าง 1 [MRcAmBc] against the target every time the 'Hands' Part is hit. (3 times per turn)
Units with [MRcAmBa] cannot ได้รับ [MRcAmBc].
When 'Grasp' unit with [MRcAmBa] is broken, all Abnormality Parts ได้รับ 3 [Vulnerable] ในเทิร์นถัดไป.

dataList.name: All-beholding Gaze
dataList.desc: When the Core HP drops below 30% of Max HP, remove [MRcAmBa] and [MRcAmBc] from all Identities; then, สร้าง [MRcAmBd] against all Identities.

dataList.name: Crushing Grasp
dataList.desc: On certain turns, if none of the enemies have [MRcAmBbDisplay], use Crush.

dataList.name: Compounded Contempt
dataList.desc: จบเทิร์น: ได้รับ 1 [CrimsonTakeDamageUp], [ScarletTakeDamageUp], [AmberTakeDamageUp], [ShamrockTakeDamageUp], or [AzureTakeDamageUp] (สูงสุด 3) ตามทุก ๆ 10 Potency of [Combustion], [Laceration], [Vibration], [Burst], or [Sinking] on self, respectively.

dataList.name: Penetrated Gaze
dataList.desc:
When hit with a Critical Hit, ได้รับ 1 [IndigoTakeDamageUp] once per Skill (สูงสุด 3)
When hit with a Skill that consumed 8+ [Charge] Count, ได้รับ 1 [VioletTakeDamageUp] once per Skill. (สูงสุด 3)

dataList.name: Grasp
dataList.desc: จบเทิร์น: at 2- [MRcAmBbDisplay] value, deal damage เท่ากับ half of the target's Max HP. Then, all Parts of Spiral of Contempt heals the same amount of HP as the damage dealt by this effect.

dataList.name: Rescue
dataList.desc: จบเทิร์น: If this unit had Contempt when getting Grasped, remove Contempt from all Identities when the Grasp is broken by an Identity.

dataList.name: Exposed Pearl
dataList.desc:
เริ่มเทิร์น: If at 0 Green Slime, become Staggered. When the Pearl Part is Staggered, Pearl Part loses all Affinity Resistances by 0.5.
Gain 10 Green Slime when recovering from Stagger.

dataList.name: Gathering Slime
dataList.desc: Fix this Part's speed to 3 for a turn when using Devouring Fluid.

dataList.name: Contaminating Slime
dataList.desc: จบเทิร์น: Apply (4 + Surviving Green Slime) Poison to all enemies.

dataList.name: Underwater Breathing
dataList.desc:
Starting from turn 2, ได้รับ 10 Poise this turn if the Fluorescence Part isn't broken. ได้รับ +3 Poise Count.
Starting from turn 2, ได้รับ 1 Paralyze and 1 Damage Down this turn if the Fluorescence Part is broken.

dataList.name: Connected Hurt
dataList.desc: Upon death, deal 10 damage to connected Mermaids. Then, apply 2 Damage Up ในเทิร์นถัดไป.
